text: Honestly, the food was quite yummy, and I think i enjoyed my dinner here. The portions are definitely a little bit smaller than usual standards but overall quite tasty. The kam heong fish was good, it was fragrant and spicy. But I would consider asking for fish fillet instead of fish head.

Horfun was a humongous portion at $17. Could have fed 5 people! Surprised by the wokhei in the kway tiao. Prawns were tiny, totally unlike the pics shown. Ingredients are not generous enough. Xinzhou meefen is a pass. Not enough taste. Charsiew cut too small for a good taste. Lemon chicken is too hard. Too much batter. Sauce is just passable. I miss the old stall!

Not bad to satisfy your need for local zichar... was abit salty to my liking though I asked for less salty. Still good to go!
Aircon coffeeshop. Crowded during meal times.

I admit this isnâ€™t the best Tze char/ fish head steamboat place but eating 5/5 because itâ€™s a rare gem in Pasir Ris!

Fish head steamboat red grouper @ $62. Fish is super fresh. Soup can be more flavourful from the start, but after some time of boiling itâ€™s really quite good.
